jd:
Hello,
Hope you are doing well,
Please check the below job description and let me know if you have any suitable candidate for the same:

Recruiters Note:- need linkedin / Federal or State experience needed / local preferred

Title: Project Manager
Location: Remote (Within Texas only)
Duration: 6 +months
MOI: skype

Job Description

WORKER SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS (Required)
• Must possess communication, analytical, and interpersonal skills at all levels of an organization
• Must have experience in managing and coordinating business and technical teams
• Must possess strong presentation skills
• Must possess problem-solving skills and ability to multi-task
• Must possess knowledge of project management body of knowledge (PMBOL) and software development lifecycle methodologies
• Must be able to work independently 
• Must be able to work in a diverse team environment 
• Must be able to work collaboratively with a variety of partners and stakeholders to ensure understanding of project goals and progress.
• Must be able to retain knowledge of environment and systems once given instruction 
• Must be able to work around projects and deadlines with readiness to put in extra effort when necessary 
• Must be able to perform related work as assigned 

PMP Certification is preferred.

II. CANDIDATE SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS
Minimum Requirements:
Candidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements (skills/experience) will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunity.

Years Required/Preferred Experience
10 Required Project Management Experience for large-scale Enterprise Implementations
8 Required State of Texas or Similar Federal/State Project Management Experience
8 Required Project Management /Systems Analyst Experience leading and managing legacy modernization projects
5 Preferred State of Texas Project Delivery Framework Experience
3 Preferred Experience with Texas Statewide systems
1 Preferred Experience with low code/no code solution
1 Preferred Knowledge of State of Texas QAT process for major Information Resources project (MIRP)
